Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    com.salesforce.androidsdk.smartstore.store.SmartStore.SOUP_NAMES_TABLE
    This has been deprecated as table has been renamed to SmartStore.SOUP_ATTRS_TABLE
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    com.salesforce.androidsdk.app.SalesforceSDKManager.decrypt(String)
    Will be removed in Mobile SDK 8.0. Use SalesforceSDKManager.decrypt(String, String) instead and use SalesforceSDKManager.getEncryptionKey() to fetch the encryption key to pass in.
    com.salesforce.androidsdk.app.SalesforceSDKManager.encrypt(String)
    Will be removed in Mobile SDK 8.0. Use SalesforceSDKManager.encrypt(String, String) instead and use SalesforceSDKManager.getEncryptionKey() to fetch the encryption key to pass in.
    com.salesforce.androidsdk.ui.PasscodeActivity.getChangeInstructions()
    Will be removed in Mobile SDK 8.0. Override in XML instead.
    com.salesforce.androidsdk.ui.PasscodeActivity.getConfirmInstructions()
    Will be removed in Mobile SDK 8.0. Override in XML instead.
    com.salesforce.androidsdk.ui.PasscodeActivity.getConfirmTitle()
    Will be removed in Mobile SDK 8.0. Override in XML instead.
    com.salesforce.androidsdk.ui.PasscodeActivity.getCreateInstructions()
    Will be removed in Mobile SDK 8.0. Override in XML instead.
    com.salesforce.androidsdk.ui.PasscodeActivity.getCreateTitle()
    Will be removed in Mobile SDK 8.0. Override in XML instead.
    com.salesforce.androidsdk.ui.PasscodeActivity.getEnterInstructions()
    Will be removed in Mobile SDK 8.0. Override in XML instead.
    com.salesforce.androidsdk.ui.PasscodeActivity.getEnterTitle()
    Will be removed in Mobile SDK 8.0. Override in XML instead.
    com.salesforce.androidsdk.ui.PasscodeActivity.getInstructionsView()
    Will be removed in Mobile SDK 8.0. Override in XML instead.
    com.salesforce.androidsdk.ui.PasscodeActivity.getLayoutId()
    Will be removed in Mobile SDK 8.0. Override in XML instead.
    com.salesforce.androidsdk.ui.PasscodeActivity.getLogoutButton()
    Will be removed in Mobile SDK 8.0. Override in XML instead.
    com.salesforce.androidsdk.security.PasscodeManager.getMinPasscodeLength()
    Will be removed in Mobile SDK 8.0. Use PasscodeManager.getPasscodeLength() instead.
    com.salesforce.androidsdk.ui.PasscodeActivity.getPasscodeFinalAttemptError()
    Will be removed in Mobile SDK 8.0. Override in XML instead.
    com.salesforce.androidsdk.ui.PasscodeActivity.getPasscodesDontMatchError()
    Will be removed in Mobile SDK 8.0. Override in XML instead.
    com.salesforce.androidsdk.ui.PasscodeActivity.getPasscodeTryAgainError(int)
    Will be removed in Mobile SDK 8.0. Override in XML instead.
    com.salesforce.androidsdk.security.SalesforceKeyGenerator.getRSAPrivateKey(String, int)
    Will be removed in Mobile SDK 8.0. Use KeyStoreWrapper.getRSAPrivateKey(String, int) instead.
    com.salesforce.androidsdk.security.SalesforceKeyGenerator.getRSAPublicKey(String, int)
    Will be removed in Mobile SDK 8.0. Use KeyStoreWrapper.getRSAPublicKey(String, int) instead.
    com.salesforce.androidsdk.security.SalesforceKeyGenerator.getRSAPublicString(String, int)
    Will be removed in Mobile SDK 8.0. Use KeyStoreWrapper.getRSAPublicString(String, int) instead.
    com.salesforce.androidsdk.ui.PasscodeActivity.getTitleView()
    Will be removed in Mobile SDK 8.0. Override in XML instead.
    com.salesforce.androidsdk.ui.PasscodeActivity.getVerifyButton()
    Will be removed in Mobile SDK 8.0. Override in XML instead.
    com.salesforce.androidsdk.security.PasscodeManager.setMinPasscodeLength(Context, int)
    Will be removed in Mobile SDK 8.0. Use PasscodeManager.setPasscodeLength(Context, int) instead.
    com.salesforce.androidsdk.security.PasscodeManager.storeMobilePolicyForOrg(UserAccount, int, int)
    Will be removed in Mobile SDK 8.0. Use PasscodeManager.storeMobilePolicyForOrg(UserAccount, int, int, boolean) instead.

    Constructor and Description
    com.salesforce.androidsdk.smartstore.store.SmartStore(SQLiteDatabase)
